block.p: SWIG-Robert. Jaffa Institute records with profound sorrow the passing of the beloved brother of our distinguished Board Member and former President of The American Friends of The Institute, Kent Swig. May Kent and the entire family be comforted among the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem. Dr. David Portowicz, Founder-Director Howard Blatt, President, American Friends Dr. Eliyahu Hartman, Vice President, Int'l Affairs
